title: LPD Investigating Shooting in East Lubbock
content:
LUBBOCK, TX -
LPD said officers received a call of shots fired at the 2100 block of E 30th Street just before 10:30 p.m.
Police said there was one report of a serious injury, and indicated that a juvenile may have been shot.
A photojournalist on scene said multiple ambulances arrived on the scene for possible injury transport.
Homicide investigators as well as members of the Juvenile Investigation team responded to the scene.
Stay with EverythingLubbock.com for details as more information becomes available.
